translated: I wore a robe of rags.
I looked after my hair and beard.🔽I stood on one foot,🔽I avoided a seat,

analyzed: āsanam parivajjayi  sukkha gūthāni ca khādi

translated: And I did not accept invitations.
Having done such things,🔽Many that lead to a bad destination,
Being swept away by a great flood,
I went for refuge to the Buddha.
See the going for refuge,🔽See the good nature of the Dhamma!
The three knowledges have been attained,
The Buddha’s instruction has been done.”
